name: Greater Rending Fury

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Rending Fury, Rending Fury, base attack bonus +12, rend special attack.

sections.body: Whenever you rend an opponent, you deal 1d6 bleed damage to that opponent. This is an addition to the effects of the rend.
sections.name: Benefits

description: When your claws latch on to an opponent, the effect is bloody and horrific.
